title: Role Reference Data Template
description: Master data tables that roles will reference (competencies, certifications, KPIs, etc.)

instructions.purpose: This file contains the master/reference data that multiple roles will share. Fill this out FIRST before filling out individual role templates.
workflow: 1. Fill out this reference data template with your organizational standards
2. Then use the unique IDs from this file in your role_enrichment_template.json
3. This ensures consistency across all roles
tips: Start with data you already have (e.g., existing competency frameworks)
Consult HR, L&D, and Compliance teams for official lists
You can always add more items later
